title: September 26, 2010
content:
Stephen Zarlenga is a noted expert on issues related to finance, securities, insurance, mutual funds, real estate, and... <!--more--> futures trading.
He’s also written 20 books on money, banking, politics and philosophy, including “The Lost Science of Money” that “exposes the mythology created to protect those who are embezzling from society” by controlling the nation’s money.
The result has been ruinous for America, more apparent now than ever.
Zarlenga heads the America Monetary Institute (AMI), its sixth annual conference taking place in Chicago from September 30 - October 3, featuring distinguished speakers.
The state of America and AMI’s conference will be discussed.
